text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: The Japanese Derby.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
How cruel that the race with the greatest history, tradition, and 
renown can only be entered once in a runner's life.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
Many famed racers have suffered defeat in the face of their 
dream—the dream of every Umamusume—to reach the pinnacle of 
racing and become Derby champion.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
On that day, an astounding 200,000 fans watched as the gates 
opened.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
In the Derby, it's no easy feat to take an early lead and keep it. But 
the runner in pink insisted on doing it her own way.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
What unfolded was not a race to outrun the rest. It was a high-speed 
war of attrition.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
She'd barely shaken off her opponents when she crossed the finish 
line. Her body exhausted, she hadn't the energy left for one more 
step.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: Her only way to win was to put every ounce of her being into it.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text: The champion's name was Ines Fujin.

text_block_list.name: Narration
text_block_list.text:
The roaring applause that echoed throughout the racecourse in Fuchu 
that day still resounds in the mind of every fan.
Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's the final straight! Which racer has what it takes to stand 
victorious?!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: You can do iiit!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Wooow! They're all so fast!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The leader has a burst of speed! Now, the runner in second place 
advances from the opposite side of the pack!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Ah! The girl in front is gonna lose the lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And she takes the lead! Just like that, she pushes ahead! She widens 
the gap between herself and her rival!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Oh no, I feel so bad for her…

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume's Mother
text_block_list.text:
Look, she hasn't given up yet. So you shouldn't give up either. Why 
don't you keep cheering her on?

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Sob… You can do it! Keep going!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
She's going all the way! There's the finish! She bested her rivals, 
taking the crown in a stunning victory!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Awww, she lost… She's crying…

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume's Mother
text_block_list.text: Yes, it's sad after she ran so well. But look, the winner's crying too.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: You're right… Why?

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume's Mother
text_block_list.text: The Derby is the dream of every one of these racers.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume's Mother
text_block_list.text:
So whether they win or lose, they'll cry. Because they gave it their 
very all to make their dream come true. They worked so hard for this.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Dream… Derby…

At Tracen Academy, the swelteringly hot days are beginning to cool 
down.

And the academy's annual autumn event, the Solefall Faire, is almost 
here.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: All right! Landed a cabbage supplier!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Cabbage? What are you talking about?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The Solefall Faire, you ding-dong! I've been planning to sell my 
special Golshi yakisoba there since forever ago!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
And I need you and our trusty trainer to pitch in. You'd better start 
practicing your griddle skills.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I don't like the sound of this at all… I'll have you taste it first, Trainer. 
Someone needs to check if it's safe.
choice_data_list:
Safe? Don't you mean I should check if it tastes 
good?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry your pretty face. I'm not gonna use anything inedible. 
Just cabbage, carrots, wasabi paste, grated wasabi, and diced wasabi.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: How much wasabi are you using?!

The whole academy is frantically preparing for the festival. In the 
midst of all the uproar, someone comes to see me.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: There you are.

Tazuna Hayakawa, assistant to the director of Tracen, approaches 
with a big smile.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
I have big news. ♪ Your predecessor is being given an award by the 
URA.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: An award? For what? Getting a kitten out of a tree?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Don't you know? It's an honor given to racers and trainers who've 
made outstanding achievements.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Some make it their mission to get it. Winners get their photo and race 
record displayed in the Umamusume Museum at the Tokyo 
Racecourse.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
And who more fitting than him? Oguri's final race is still a favorite 
among fans.

It's not just the fans. Mejiro McQueen and I will never forget that 
Arima Kinen run either.

It's not just the fans. Mejiro McQueen and I will never forget that 
Arima Kinen run either.
My mentor really was out of this world. Truly amazing.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: The awards ceremony will be broadcast live, so don't miss it!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: In other matters, I have a small favor to ask…

Tazuna directs me to the academy library, where I've been asked to 
help a student prepare something for the Solefall Faire.
Waaaaah! I'm gonna CRY!
No matter how many defeats or injuries, she kept on running. This racer had SO much heart. Sob…

Her voice shatters the silence of the library. With no one else around, 
I know who it is I'm supposed to assist.
choice_data_list:
Are you the one who needs help with the 
Solefall Faire?

Are you the one who needs help with the 
Solefall Faire?

text_block_list.text:
Ah! Are you the trainer Ms. Tazuna was talking about? Thank 
goodneeess! Finally some help! I'm SAVED!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wait… I didn't introduce myself! Nice to meet ya! I'm Winning Ticket!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Really though, I volunteered 'cause I had this rad idea, but now that 
I'm in the thick of prepping, I can't manage at all.
choice_data_list: I'm here to help. What do you need?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Straight to the point! I need to make displays for a Derby history 
exhibit!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
We're gonna display it all! The passion and excitement of each and 
every racer who took on the Derby, with no details left out!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Like this racer who sprinted into first place from way outside! After all the hard work it took to reach the Derby, it's like she knew that was her moment!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: And this one—she took a huge lead right from the start, kept it all the way to the end and took first! It's super hard to pull off a win like that, but she knew she could do it. Sob…

The Derby is a prestigious race, and it's often thought to be the top 
event of the Twinkle Series.

Some people even think the year begins and ends with it. It's 
definitely a big deal.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The Derby really is the best! Yeeeah! I wanna be Derby champiooon!
Her eyes tear up as she talks. She must really love it…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for staying so late! When it comes to the Derby, I just get so 
pumped up, you know?
No problem. It's super interesting. It's really special for you, huh?
No problem. It's super interesting. It's really special for you, huh?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! The Derby's my dream!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna enter someday and win it! It's my dream to stand among the 
greats and make my own amazing story!

Looking at the excited racer as she cries with emotion, it's hard to 
believe how she can be so breathtakingly earnest.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Well, first I need to be scouted to do it. And it's gotta be a trainer 
who can take me all the way there!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but I have to focus on the exhibit! We can't fail if we work 
together!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And you know, you can call me Tickezo. Easier than saying my full 
name, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hehe! Thanks, Trainer!
Who knows whether she can get into the Derby, let alone win it?

But one thing's for sure. Her chasing that purehearted dream is a story 
I'd love to watch unfold.
